trans-unit.source: Specifies how items align in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a forma como os itens Alinhar no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilize os membros desta enumeração para definir o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user moves an item, it remains where it is dropped.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador move um item, este irá permanecer onde é removido.

trans-unit.source: Items are aligned to the left of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Os itens são alinhados para a esquerda do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Items are aligned to an invisible grid in the control.
trans-unit.target: Itens são alinhados com uma grelha no controlo invisível.

trans-unit.source: When the user moves an item, it moves to the closest juncture in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador move um item, este move o juncture mais próximo na grelha.

trans-unit.source: Items are aligned to the top of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Os itens são alinhados na parte superior do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo.
